ARABIC: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ ٱللَّعْنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The curse will be on you till the Day of Reckoning.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Condemned till the day of Doom!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and there shall be a curse upon you till the Day of Recompense."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and will be subjected to condemnation until the Day of Judgment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And indeed you are accursed till the Day of Judgement.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, the curse shall be upon you until the Day of Recompense."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And surely on you is curse until the day of judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon thee shall rest the curse, till the Day of Doom.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! the curse shall be upon thee till the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and the curse shall be on you till the Day of Judgement!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily on thee shall be the curse till the Day of Requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and indeed the curse shall lie on you until the Day of Retribution.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And the curse shall be on thee till the day of Judgment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, the curse shall be upon you till the Day of Recompense (i.e. the Day of Resurrection)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: A curse shall be on you till the Day of Recompense'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “And the curse will be upon you until the Day of Judgment.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:35] And indeed the curse shall rest upon you until the Day of Judgement’, [the Day] of Requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! the curse) My curse and the curse of the angels and all created beings (shall be upon you till the Day of Judgement) until the Day of Reckoning.
